title: Similar typefaces to Scout Condensed and Fort
content:
Does anyone know any similar typefaces or fonts to Scout Condensed and Fort that are free or commonly owned?

[http://www.webtype.com/font/scout-family/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417025149/http:/www.webtype.com/font/scout-family/ "http://www.webtype.com/font/scout-family/")  
 [http://www.webtype.com/font/fort-family/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417025149/http:/www.webtype.com/font/fort-family/ "http://www.webtype.com/font/fort-family/")
author: bfingeroth

comments.content:
Don't think you'll have good suggestions. My 2 cent:  
- 1: these typefaces are rather unique (at least to me) so pretty convinced nothing really approaching could be suggested  
- 2: free fonts are not very appreciated by forum members. Most are type designers or type-business related, some sell their creations so suggesting alternative free fonts might sound off-topic  
- 3: many free fonts are actually rip-off/bad copies/illegal clones and have fooled more than once many people from this community so suggesting free alternatives is always kind of risky  
- 4: asking for free alternatives without specifying context/purpose could also be wrongly appreciated, possibly meaning you don't want to pay the price for the type designer hard work.  
Anyway, here are 2 trusted sources for free fonts: [Google Fonts directory](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417025149/http:/www.google.com/fonts), [Fontsquirrel](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417025149/http:/www.fontsquirrel.com/)  
Good luck!
